def Load(widget): from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import FieldDefinition
registro = widget.Entity statusAditivo = int(registro.Fields["OBJETO"].Instance.Fields["ADITIVO"].Instance.Fields["STATUS"].Value) statusEmElaboracao = 1 if (statusAditivo != statusEmElaboracao): widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = False
